alert.note: Alert for Craighead; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 24 at 6:54PM CDT until March 24 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CRAIGHEAD...EASTERN POINSETT...WESTERN MISSISSIPPI...NORTHWESTERN CRITTENDEN AND NORTHEASTERN CROSS COUNTIES... At 654 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Caraway, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Marked Tree, Lepanto, Caraway, Tyronza, Keiser, Joiner, Dyess, Gilmore, Bassett, Marie, Little River, Turrell, Etowah, Birdsong, Three Forks, Dimple, Eastview, Lennie, Vail and Deckerville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for eastern Arkansas...and west Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
